Title: The Great World in Shanghai
Publisher: Shanghai renmin meishu chubanshe (上海人民美术出版社)
Notes: The Great World Entertainment Center in Shanghai by night. Compared to the 1957 poster, the entertainment has been modernized. A film is being shown, and there are some fairground attractions, such as a punchball, a shooting gallery and a carnival mirror.Designer Zhang Yuqing again delighted in the details. Each face in the crowd is different and individual.Faces in the crowdWoman and child in front of a carnival mirrorFaces in the crowdPunchball and shooting galleryThis is a print from the second edition (November 1962).
